text:
Please see debian bug at 233766.
http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=233766

Generally this happens for any call to apr_uid_name_get() when the given userid
is not in /etc/passwd.
Maybe a similar bug is in apr_gid_name_get().
creator: philipp.marek@bmlv.gv.at
jorton@redhat.com
text:
The error handling was fubar throughout all these functions; it's now fixed up
for future releases (the patch referenced in the Debian report was not correct).
 Thanks for the report.

http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs?rev=239592&view=rev
